news.title: Trump keeps threatening to punish Putin. Here's what's holding him back
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump says he'll punish Russia if Moscow doesn't agree to peace talks with Ukraine. Yet, he hasn't pushed the button, so far.

news.title: An Iowa nuclear plant is the next contender to restart, spurred by AI data center demand
news.summary: The Duane Arnold nuclear plant in Iowa shut down in 2020. It could come back online to support growing power demand from the tech sector.

news.title: Plane carrying EU leader hit with suspected Russian GPS interference
news.summary: The European Union said Russia was suspected of jamming the GPS system of a plane carrying European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen to Bulgaria.

news.title: Wegovy trial result gives boost to Novo Nordisk amid U.S. market woes
news.summary: Novo Nordisk has been swept up in uncertainty around U.S. tariffs. Washington's push to get firms to lower drug prices and move manufacturing stateside.

news.title: Trump tariffs that are voided by — and ones that are safe from — Friday's appeals court ruling
news.summary: President Donald Trump would lose some, but not all, of his broad tariff powers. If the Supreme Court upholds the ruling, President Trump would be stripped of some of his powers. The Supreme Court is expected to rule on the case in the coming weeks.

news.title: September is historically the worst month of the year for stocks. Why this time could be different.
news.summary: September has long carried a reputation as the most challenging month of the year for U.S. stocks. It is marked by seasonal weakness and a higher likelihood of volatility after the quiet summer months.

news.title: Europe’s central bank boss joins warnings about threat to Fed’s independence from White House ‘intervention’
news.summary: Economists in FT poll fret that the U.S. central bank is being compromised. They say the Fed's independence is at risk.

news.title: Is the stock market open tomorrow for Labor Day? Does the post office deliver mail?
news.summary: The end-of-summer holiday is upon us, so be prepared for plenty of closings. Be prepared for closings at schools across the U.S.

news.title: Gold futures rise to record high on Fed concerns, rate cut expectations
news.summary: CNN.com will feature iReporter photos in a weekly Travel Snapshots gallery. Please submit your best shots of New York for next week. Visit CNN.com/Travel next Wednesday for a new gallery of snapshots.

news.title: This ‘twice in a lifetime’ opportunity means the S&P 500 can hit 7,750 by end of next year
news.summary: A structural tech-driven bull market has much further to go says Evercore’s Emanuel. Evercore's Emanuel: ‘The tech bull market is not over yet.’
